content.raw:
Clang-tidy has some style complaints:

```
/home/chapulina/blueprint_ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/gui/plugins/scene3d/Scene3D.cc:611:62: warning: invalid case style for parameter 'axis' [readability-identifier-naming]         
math::Vector3d IgnRenderer::GetXYZConstraint(math::Vector3d &axis)                                                                                                                                                                           ^~~~~      
                                                             _axis                                                                                                              
/home/chapulina/blueprint_ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/gui/plugins/scene3d/Scene3D.cc:815:24: warning: invalid case style for variable 'current_rot' [readability-identifier-naming]           math::Vector3d current_rot = rotation.Euler();        
                       ^~~~~~~~~~~                                                                                                                                              
                       currentRot                                                                                                                                               /home/chapulina/blueprint_ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/gui/plugins/scene3d/Scene3D.cc:816:24: warning: invalid case style for variable 'new_rot' [readability-identifier-naming]
        math::Vector3d new_rot = SnapPoint(current_rot, IGN_PI/4);                                                                                                              
                       ^~~~~~~                                                                                                                                                                         newRot                                      
/home/chapulina/blueprint_ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/gui/plugins/scene3d/Scene3D.hh:239:62: warning: invalid case style for parameter 'axis' [readability-identifier-naming]         
    private: math::Vector3d GetXYZConstraint(math::Vector3d &axis);                                                                                                                                                                          ^~~~~
                                                             _axis  
```

There are instructions on running tidy [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/default/CONTRIBUTING.md).
